climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: INFANT NUTRITION: This gentle formula is designed to ease babies who experience fussiness, gas, and crying while encouraging immunity and brain and eye development
EASY TO PREPARE: Simple-to-follow directions on the back of the formula container help you prepare your little one’s baby bottle with the right water-to-formula powder ratio for their feeding needs
FIRST 12 MONTHS: Support development and nourish your baby from their first day to their first birthday
EARTH'S BEST: Explore our full line of baby nutrition to find more sensitive baby formulas, gentle formulas, plant-based formulas, and toddler formulas
21 OZ FORMULA CONTAINER: Includes one 21 oz container of Earth's Best Organic Gentle Infant Formula
body.description: Your little one's dietary needs are unique, so their formula should be too. Our formulas at Earth's Best Organic are available in a variety of options to fit dietary restrictions like lactose sensitivity, lactose intolerance, and sensitive stomachs, making it easy to choose the right formula for your baby's nourishment needs. Made with organic milk from grass and grain-fed cows§, Earth's Best Organic Gentle Infant Formula with Iron is an easy-to-digest option that includes nutrients like lutein, prebiotics, and DHA and ARA to give your baby nutrients that support immunity, brain development, and eye development. Whether you're looking for a way to supplement breastfeeding or for a nutrient-rich replacement, Earth's Best Organic infant formulas are a wholesome way to nourish your baby throughout their first twelve months. §USDA organic regulations require cows have access to pasture where they eat grass and other organic feed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Choosing the Perfect Formula Breast feeding is the first choice for infant nutrition, but if and when you choose formula, even if to supplement, it is important to understand the options available. For babies who can't tolerate a milk based formula, there are options. Milk based Soy based Partially Hydrolyzed Protein for babies with fussiness and gas Gentle formula with easy to digest proteins, including partially hydrolyzed whey

Earth's Best Organic Sensitivity Baby Formula Earth's Best Non-GMO Soy Baby Formula Earth's Best Organic Gentle Baby Formula Earth's Best Organic Dairy Baby Formula Explore More Products Reduced Lactose for Fussiness, Gas, and Crying Lactose-Free Easy to Digest Proteins for Fussiness, Gas, and Crying Our Closest Formula to Breast Milk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The is the best formula you can buy.
reviews.reviewText: I was kinda disappointed when I couldn't make milk and nurse but we used this for our daughter and she did so well. We have a foster baby now and he had so many problems w Similac. I am so glad his pediatrician let me switch. He is much healthier now. Worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No complaints here! :)
reviews.reviewText: I am currently using this as a "just in case" back up, for when we go out and I can't pump or breastfeed. So far I have no complaints, my baby likes it and she has not had a bad reaction. But again I only give it to her when I really need to, so I guess I can say it's a good transition so far from breast milk to formula.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best organic sourced ingredients and at a good price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This formula is really the value for your money. It’s organic and Earth’s Best is a long time standing company that I will stand behind. We’ve use their formula for the last 10 years on and off of course and it is some thing we will use for all of our babies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m happy we’re going with this… baby’s stools seem regular and she seems to like it, even better than the purple can… currently at 4oz. Will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My baby took it no problem
reviews.reviewText: I was exclusively breastfeeding until she turned 6 months and since she kept waking for 2am feeds. I recently made the change and she luckily had no reaction and has slept through the night since we made the change. I just make sure she is throughly burped because I can feel and hear the gas build up from the bottle. So far I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hands down The Best!
reviews.reviewText: In my new mom journey, one thing that gave me much stress was choosing a formula! For the first 6.5 months of my sons life, ï breastfed…but then ï was noticing no matter what ï did, ï was no longer producing enough to satiate him…and so ï had to delve into the deeeeeppp research of formulas to supplement, and then eventually transition to…In my research of the ingredients in literally ALL the brands and all the different products each brand produces…I’ve learned 1. The mainstream brands are pretty horrible (chemically speaking) and Ï truly cannot understand why people would choose them….sadly when I’ve surveyed many moms who do..the sole answer was “because it’s what WIC will give for free.” So to not have a brand like this under WIC as an option is pretty messed up.2. The ONLY other brands that can compare are Bobbie, and HIPP. Only reason ï didn’t put them as number one is because HIPP does use corn syrup and neither taste as good as this.Lastly: Not all Earth’s Best products are created equal. I’ve found the Gentle to be the all time winner. The original red can’s formula compares to the mainstream brands for sure, just uses organic milk powder. The purple sensitive can is most likely going to cause constipation for babies due to the fats/oils it uses. (Especially for babies under 6 months)Again, HANDS DOWN, Earth’s Best Gentle IS the #1 choice of all formulas. Don’t believe me? Please, mom’s and dad’s, DO YOUR OWN RESEARCH!To: Earth’s Best, ï thank thee

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great organic gentle option !
reviews.reviewText: So initially we had a very rough start for our 3 month old, we started supplementing when we cam home from hospital with similac sensitive, it did not seem to agree with her at all and I am not a fan of generic run of the mill formulas sold on the market, I really wanted something organic but gentle...so we started giving her this. Now I'll be honest the transition was not great, she was still fussy and constipated...we even tried earths best sensitive and that was even worse! We came back to the gentle and we stuck with it, after 14 days her bowel movement became healthy again , and we saw less fussing and she became all around more comfortable. We also started giving her cultrelle probiotic drops, and it worked wonders! I'm so happy we gave this formula another chance cause it ended up really working well for our LO.
